alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 10:18PM AKDT until April 07 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area, including Sitka and Port Alexander. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence in high winds occurring has lowered due to latest models showing the storm tracking more offshore. The forecast will continue to be monitored.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
